name: dtiflix-backend
description: Full stack application built with Next.js + TypeScript and Sequelize, integrating the OMDb API to search movies, manage favorites, write reviews, and display personalized statistics in a dashboard. Includes search history, average ratings, favorite genres/decades, and a responsive UI.

scripts.db:cli: docker exec -it postgres-seguro psql -U postgres -d dtiflix_db
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:drop: docker exec -it postgres-seguro psql -U postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS dtiflix_db;"
scripts.db:create: docker exec -it postgres-seguro psql -U postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE dtiflix_db;"
